title: Black Mass
description: The minor masterpiece of the ’90s action oeuvre that laid the groundwork for such films as Tarantino’s Reservoir Dogs and Fincher’s Seven.
altHero: priest holding a gun walks down the aisle of a dark church with big stained glass window behind
alt1: open door of a confessional in a dark church
alt2: man in the confessional and Sean Walker is on the other side
alt3: Sean Walker as the priest holding a gun
alt4: man falling down after being shot
